reviewText: EXTREMELY GOOD - Replete with "insider" expert testimony. Although it's nice to see what speakers look like (for starters anyway), this is mostly "talking heads" so after seeing AND listening to entire production, I converted DVD disks into MP4 and MP3 files. It's tragic that USA so-called "Democratic" leaders such as Nancy Patricia D'Alesandro Pelosi took prosecution of Dick, George, and Rummy "off the table."
